name: Ashwagandha Powder 100g
description: Recharge Your Body & Mind with Ancient Ayurvedic Wisdom
Our Ashwagandha Powder is made from premium-grade, sun-dried ashwagandha roots, finely ground to preserve all their adaptogenic properties.
Ashwagandha (Withania somnifera) is one of the most powerful herbs in Ayurveda, known for reducing stress, boosting energy, improving mental focus, and enhancing physical strength.
Whether you're an athlete, working professional, or simply someone seeking natural wellness, this herb is your go-to daily rejuvenator.
Mix 1 tsp with warm water, milk, honey, or in smoothies and consume regularly for visible benefits.
highlights: Pure & Natural Root Powder | Stress Relief | Energy & Immunity Booster | No Additives & Preservatives
benefits: Reduces Stress & Anxiety – A powerful adaptogen that helps balance cortisol and promote calmness.
Boosts Energy & Stamina – Enhances physical strength and endurance naturally.
Supports Immunity & Vitality – Strengthens immune system and supports overall wellness.
